Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 13 assists, 12 rebounds and three blocks.
Anthony Davis had a 31-point night and contributed nine rebounds and four blocks.
D'Angelo Russell responded with 18 points, three assists and two rebounds after being benched.
Caleb Martin and Andre Drummond combined for 27 points, 15 rebounds, five assists and three steals.
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers ended a two-game losing streak with a 116-106 victory against the 76ers.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win.
